description:
Michelle Williams and her daughter, Matilda Ledger, braved the cold while heading to school in Brooklyn today.

The pair was joined by Michelle's mother, Carla, for the morning outing, and Matilda was dressed up in a tulle skirt and fur accessories — an ensemble perfectly befitting for a birthday girl!

Matilda turns 8 years old today and is likely preparing for some fun with family and friends, as well as great gifts from her famous godparents, Jake Gyllenhaal and Busy Philipps.
Michelle has been spending most of her time in the Big Apple with her growing girl, and even between recent high-profile appearances, the actress hasn't seemed to miss an opportunity to join Matilda on her daily school run.

沪江娱乐：米歇尔威廉姆斯和女儿玛蒂尔达·莱杰日前冒着寒冷去在布鲁克林的学校。前天是玛蒂尔达八岁的生日，看来她也准备好和家人朋友一起度过愉快的一天。当然玛蒂尔达也收到了来自她有名的教父教母杰克·吉伦哈尔和贝西·菲利普斯的礼物。妈妈米歇尔最近都在纽约和陪伴女儿，甚至不错过陪伴女儿一起去学校的机会。真是个好妈妈！

description:
你还在雅思备考的泥潭中挣扎吗？你还在为达不到理想的雅思成绩而迷茫吗？提出你雅思备考遇到的问题，新东方英联邦部总监、雅思名师张驰新老师将在之后的公开课中，为你指点迷津，60分钟雅思备考困惑一扫而空。

张驰新 >>>戳我前往老师部落<<<
上海外国语大学英语语言文学专业毕业，英国威尔士大学MBA，清华大学MBA，上海新东方英联邦部总监。上海新东方特别贡献奖获得者。雅思命题机构IDP International中担任testee，后在悉尼总部R&D部门参与雅思题库的整理和编辑，曾三次取得雅思移民及学术类考试Band 8，是作文方面的权威，国内外学生总数超过两万，七分以上学员过千。课程依托基础，强化应试，深谙雅思的操作原则和考官的阅卷心理，精通预测，2003年所考作文真题无一不出自于张老师的作文“白皮书”。希望和学员分享内部教研成果和异国激情感慨。 
m Motto：雅思不仅是幽“雅”的“思”绪，我认为 IELTS就是Intelligence+Endurance+Laboriousness+Tactfulness=Success.

雅思备考有各种问题期待名师解答？赶紧写下你的问题，就有机会得到张老师的亲自指点哦！

想跟张老师深入探究雅思奥秘，猛戳这里>>99元团张驰新雅思全能密码互动课

description:
沪江英乐：英西班牙情歌王子 Enrique Iglesias 新单曲《Heart Attack》MV！在MV的剧情中，安叔心爱的女人出轨了，安叔很是伤心。对于安叔来说，如此确切的爱在这一生中只会出现一次。最后，当安叔试图轻生时，爱人回来了。若不谈剧情，只听声音，小编觉得安叔的口音才是最性感的所在。

【Enrique Iglesias 新单《Heart Attack》】

歌词：

[Verse 1]

Loving you was easy
thought you'd never leave me
yeah yeah

Wrapped around my finger
see ya when I see ya
yeah yeah

Now I'm hearing around
that you been running around

I didn't think I'd miss you
Now I'm feeling like a fool
ooh ohh

[Chorus]

It hit me like a heart attack
when you finally left me girl
I thought I'd never want you back
But I don't wanna live in a world with without you

I don't wanna live in a world with without you

[Verse 2]

Never really noticed
all the little things you did
you did

Never bought you roses
always was around my friends
my friends

And now I'm hearing around
that you been running around

I didn't think I'd miss you
Now I'm feeling like a fool
ooh ohh

[Chorus]

It hit me like a heart attack
when you finally left me girl
I thought I'd never want you back
But I don't wanna live in a world with without you

I don't wanna live in a world with without you

[Bridge]

Never should have let you slip away
Living in a world that's turned to grey
Little did I know it hurt so bad
Cause It hit me like a heart attack…

[Chorus]

It hit me like a heart attack
when you finally left me girl
I thought I'd never want you back
But I don't wanna live in a world with without you

I don't wanna live in a world with without you

No oh

[Outro]

Now I'm hearing around
that you been running around

I didn't think I'd miss you
Now I'm feeling like a fool
ooh ohh

description:
沪江英乐：“我们不是一支流行乐队，我们凭什么要有花花绿绿的颜色！” 英国独立摇滚乐队The 1975最新录影带《Girls》释出啦。难道没有比五颜六色更让一支摇滚乐队反感的东西了吗？ 性感辣模清纯女郎齐上阵，只要有姑娘，凭什么不能唱欢乐的歌？

【独立摇滚乐队The 1975最新录影带《Girls》】

歌词：

[Verse 1]
I like your face despite your nose
17 and a half years old
I'm worrying about my brother finding out
Where’s the fun in doing what you're told?

I said 'No!'
'Oh give it a rest, I could persuade you'
'I'm not your typical, stoned 18 year old'
'Give me a night I'll make you'
'I know you're looking for salvation in the secular age, but girl I'm not your savior
Wrestle to the ground.
God help me now because,

[Chorus]
They're just girls breaking hearts
Eyes bright uptight, just girls
But she can't be what you need if she's 17
They're just girls
They're just girls

[Verse 2]
A pair of frozen hands to hold,
Oh she's so southern so she feels the cold,
One moment I was tearing off your blouse,
Now you're living in my house.
What happened to just messing around?

I said "Yo, I think I better go. I can't take you"
"You just sit and get stoned with 30 year olds and you think you've made it"
"Well, shouldn't you be fucking with somebody your age instead of making changes?"
Wrestle to the ground.
God help me now because,

[Chorus]
They're just girls breaking hearts
Eyes bright uptight, just girls
But she can't be what you need if she's 17
They're just girls
They're just girls

Told her from the start,
Destined to be hard.
Told her from the start
I’m breaking your heart
Destined to be hard
I’ll break your heart

I said "Yo, I think I better go. I can't take you"'
I know you're looking for salvation in the secular age, but girl I'm not your savior
'"Well, shouldn't you be fucking with somebody your age instead of making changes?"
Wrestle to the ground.
God help me now because,

[Chorus] x2
They're just girls breaking hearts
Eyes bright uptight, just girls
But she can't be what you need if she's 17
They're just girls
They're just girls

Cause they're just girls

Just girls
They're just girls
